text: Daniel John Bigham (born 2 October 1991) is a British racing cyclist, who currently rides for UCI Continental team . He rode in the men's individual pursuit event at the 2018 UCI Track Cycling World Championships. ==Major results== ;2016 : 3rd Beaumont Trophy ;2017 : National Track Championships ::1st 20px Kilo ::1st 20px Individual pursuit ::1st 20px Team pursuit : 1st 15px Team pursuit – Minsk, 2017–18 UCI Track Cycling World Cup ;2018 : 1st 15px Team pursuit – London, 2017–18 UCI Track Cycling World Cup : 2nd 15px Individual pursuit, National Track Championships ;2019 : National Track Championships ::1st 20px Team pursuit ::2nd 15px Individual pursuit : 3rd 15px Mixed team relay, UCI Road World Championships : 4th Beaumont Trophy : 5th Time trial, National Road Championships ==References== ==External links== * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:British male cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Newcastle-under-Lyme
title: Daniel Bigham
